failure.title: Oops! Something went wrong

recoverable.description: Unfortunately, your withdrawal request could not be processed in time. This could be due to a temporary problem such as bad internet connection.
recoverable.cta: Either try to continue or start over.

failure.copyTransactionId: In case you experience any issues, please copy this
failure.contactedSupport: Contacted support and ready to start fresh with a new transaction?

progress.transferringToLocalPartner: Transferring to local partner for bank transfer

success.title: All set! The withdrawal has been sent to your bank.

arrivalText.EURC: Funds will be received in 1 min (Instant SEPA) or 2 days (Standard SEPA). SEPA type dependent on the recipient bank support.
arrivalText.ARS: Your funds will arrive in your bank account in a few minutes.
arrivalText.BRL: Your funds will arrive in your bank account in a few minutes.
arrivalText.default: Your funds will arrive in your bank account soon.
